Location

Venue

The tournament is held at River Pool & Sports Bar, located at 19 NW 5th Ave, Downtown Portland. The venue is easily accessible by public transit and offers a welcoming atmosphere for players and spectators alike. Tables are always free at River — first come, first served for practice before the tournament.

Transportation

MAX Light Rail

Two MAX Light Rail stations are located within a short walk of the venue:

  • NW 5th & Couch: Served by the Green, Orange, and Yellow MAX lines, as well as the Blue and Yellow bus lines.
  • NW 6th & Davis: Also served by the Green, Orange, and Yellow MAX lines, plus Blue and Yellow bus lines.

Other Options

Lime Scooters: Lime scooters are commonly parked throughout downtown Portland. Use the Lime app to locate and unlock a scooter nearby. Availability may vary, but scooters are typically clustered around high-traffic areas like NW 5th & Couch.

Uber: Download the Uber app to request a ride from anywhere in Portland. River Pool & Sports Bar is a well-known landmark and easy to locate within the app.

Lyft: Lyft also operates throughout downtown Portland. You can request a ride by downloading the Lyft app. Like Uber, pickup from River is fast and convenient.

Nearby Parking Map

Use the interactive map below to explore nearby parking options around River Pool & Sports Bar.

Parking

  • On-street metered parking: Available throughout downtown Portland. Always check signage for time limits and payment details.
  • SmartPark Garages: Five public garages are operated by the city nearby. Visit the Portland Parking Guide for locations and rates.
  • Private lots: Additional paid lots and garages are within walking distance. Availability and prices may vary.
